platform_introduction.title: ZentrumHub Platform Introduction
platform_introduction.content: ZentrumHub is a travel technology platform that enables travel agencies to sell hotel inventories to their agents or end users. Integrated with more than 60 suppliers with global coverage. Operates in BYOL (bring your own license) setup. Platform maintains high performance with typical overhead < 1sec and availability rate > 99.99%.

products.booking_engine: Helps travel companies connect to multiple suppliers via universal APIs. Aggregates results across all licensed suppliers. AI-enabled to present most relevant hotels.
products.connect: Helps consumers connect to chosen suppliers via single unified API. Designed for OTAs/bedbanks who already have a booking engine.
products.aqua: White-label UI solution for hotel booking platform. Available for B2B and B2C. Integrated with Zentrum Booking Engine.
products.backoffice: Streamlines operations with control over business configuration. Role-based access. Manage bookings across suppliers.

platform_introduction.suppliers: All OTAs, GDS, bedbanks, and channel managers that provide hotel inventory and rates.

price_api.title: Price API
price_api.description: Fetches final price of selected rooms/rates before booking. Crucial because rates are fetched dynamically and prices may update.
price_api.mandatory: Yes, this step is mandatory before book API call
workflow: Obtain recommendationId, token, and hotelId from RoomRates API response
Pass details to Price API endpoint as route parameters
If multiple rateIds received, sum up prices to show total
Display content from same supplier whose rates are returned

supplier_content_matching.requirement: Mandatory to display content from same supplier as rates
supplier_content_matching.how_to: Extract providerName from rate object, pass as providerPrefs parameter in getHotelContent API

faqs.q: Do I need to make Price API call before booking?
faqs.a: Yes, mandatory before book API call

faqs.q: Does price get updated every time?
faqs.a: Depends on supplier. All calls are dynamic, no caching

faqs.q: Why use recommendationId instead of rateIds?
faqs.a: Each recommendation contains rateIds from single supplier only. Platform doesn't support multi-supplier pricing

error_codes.4001: Invalid data in request - Check fields[] for details
error_codes.5000: Unknown system error - Contact support with correlationId
error_codes.5001: Unknown supplier error - Contact support with correlationId

book_api.title: Book API
book_api.description: Final step in search-to-book flow. Requires passenger info, contact info, and payment info to complete booking at quoted price.
book_api.credit_card_requirement: Depends on payment terms and account configurations with supplier. If supplier needs credit card, pass it in Booking API. ZentrumHub forwards to supplier but doesn't store or charge the card.
book_api.guest_details_requirement: Check allGuestInfoRequired field from Price API response. If true, pass all guest details. Otherwise, type and age (for children) is enough.

timeout_handling.scenario: Timeout error or non-confirmed booking status
steps: On timeout or non-confirmed status, initiate polling
Make successive calls to getBookingDetails API at 10-second intervals
Continue polling for maximum 5 minutes (30 attempts)
Check booking status from each polling call
If unconfirmed after 5 minutes, implement error handling
benefits: Minimizes risk of failed bookings due to timeout

rooms_rates_api.title: RoomsRates API (Get Rooms and Rates)
rooms_rates_api.description: Fetches comprehensive details for various room options provided by hotel. Returns rooms with details and rates with pricing information.
rooms_rates_api.purpose: While Search API returns minimum rate, hotels offer multiple rooms with varying rates. This API fetches all room options.

returns.rooms: Room details including name, description, facilities, bed info, area
returns.rates: Rate details including total rate, base rate, taxes, fees, refundability, cancellation policies
returns.recommendations: Pre-built rate combinations for multi-room searches

recommendations.description: Pre-built combinations of rates that can be booked together. Each recommendation contains rates from single supplier only.
recommendations.why_use: Simplifies multi-room booking by providing valid rate combinations. Platform doesn't support multi-supplier pricing.

structure.rates: Array of rate IDs that can be booked together
structure.totalPrice: Combined price of all rates in recommendation
structure.supplier: Single supplier for all rates in recommendation

recommendations.usage: Use recommendationId (not individual rateIds) when calling Price API for multi-room searches

rate_combinability.description: Rules for combining different rates in multi-room searches

types.None: Ignore these rates - should not be combined with any other rates
types.GroupWithinSameId: Combine rates with SAME RateCombinabilityId, excluding itself
types.GroupSameId: Combine rates with SAME RateCombinabilityId, including itself

example_2_room_search.None: Rate with rateCombinabilityType: 'None' should be ignored
example_2_room_search.GroupWithinSameId: Rate id:23 (RateCombinabilityId:'111') can combine with id:24 and id:14 (both have '111')
example_2_room_search.GroupSameId: Combine rates id:13 and id:21 (both have RateCombinabilityId:'111')

faqs.q: Does API return charges to be paid at property?
faqs.a: Yes, if suppliers provide this data

faqs.q: Why use recommendationId instead of rateIds?
faqs.a: Recommendations contain rates from single supplier only. Platform doesn't support multi-supplier pricing. Suppliers may not support combining different rateIds.
